name: Roadtrip (igd)
description:
Created for the AudioMob game jam, this little game is the seed of a bigger project.

The Jam was judged based on how well integrated AudioMob's audio ads were into the project with a focus on allowing gameplay to continue around the ad. My solution was to create an infinite runner game about driving a car across country with the radio on. The radio plays music with a continuity announcer and between songs, the ads on the radio station are real ads.

The game will later be expanded to include phone calls from various family members, allowing a branching narrative to be told through the game.
